item.title: Overview
item.description: MapCalibration Aplikacja MapCalibration służy do wspomagania… The MapCalibration app's aim is to assist satnav-based navigation for maps without GPS coordinates. The main idea is to calibrate the map by setting reference markers on a satellite photo map, in locations easy to identify on both maps.
